Reviews.Title: Sony CyberShot DCS-W50
Reviews.Author: Ann
Reviews.Content: Like the camera and wanted it for the date feature but the date is too big and in the wrong place on the developed picture.

Reviews.Title: HATE IT!
Reviews.Author: Diana
Reviews.Content: I had to buy this camera cuz I was in desperate need of one after my NIKON coolpix got stolen. A friend of mine has the same camera, the SONY cybershot and can't stand it either. She likes the NIKON better too. I want the NIKON again and been wanting to sell the SONY. The picture quality isn't as good esp when you do have to hurry and shoot, there is no option to print the date/time on the pics, fireworks and the like are a blurry something, just a few things of the overall impression. not impressed with this camera

ProductInfo.Name: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-W50 6MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom Black
